quote: “Everything will turn out right, the world is built on that.”
author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quote: “You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If you want to build a ship, don’t drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work, and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: “Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd.”
author: Rumi

quote: “When a stargirl cries, she sheds not tears but light.”
author: Jerry Spinelli

quote: “If you can't run, you crawl. If you can't crawl-- you find someone to carry you.”
author: Joss Whedon

quote: “Fair means everyone gets what they need. And the only way to get what you need is to make it happen yourself.”
author: Rick Riordan

quote: “Education is teaching our children to desire the right things.”
author: Plato

quote: “To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.”
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: “Happiness is always there. You just have to choose to see it. There's no point dwelling in the dark and ignoring the light of the stars.”
author: Carrie Hope Fletcher

quote: “God turns you from one feeling to another and teaches by means of opposites so that you will have two wings to fly, not one”
author: Rumi

quote: “We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize that we only have one.”
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: “Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Conquer the angry one by not getting angry; conquer the wicked by goodness; conquer the stingy by generosity, and the liar by speaking the truth.[Verse 223]”
author: Siddhārtha Gautama

quote: “My name is Celaena Sardothien," she whispered, "and I will not be afraid.”
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: “Life is wasted on the living.”
author: Douglas Adams

quote: “Sometimes, as we're stumbling along in the dark, we hit something good.”
author: Susan Ee

quote: “It doesn't matter what you do...so long as you change something from the way it was before you touched it into something that's like you after you take your hands away.”
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: “Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?”
author: che guevara

quote: “If I must fall, may it be from a high place.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Nothing ever really goes away--it just changes into something else. Something beautiful.”
author: Sarah Ockler

quote: “Are you on our side...and want to be different, or are you on that side and want to throw a football at my head!?”
author: Gerard Way
